Welcome¶

Bootstrap-4 plugin for CakePHP-3

This plugin transparently styles HTML elements for Bootstrap 4

Requirements¶

  • CakePHP 3.3 (3.3.15 minimum)
  • Bootstrap 4.0.0-alpha6
  • jQuery 1.8+

Supported Elements¶

  • Flash messages
  • Forms
  • Html Buttons, crumbs, progress
